sentences: Ta keris raudselt oma eesmärgi poole.
Meie koer kerib pidevalt põranda all.
Keri on ilus ja keerukas ornament.
context: The Estonian word 'keri' can have multiple meanings, including to aim for something with determination, to curl or coil (like a dog rolling around), or it can refer to an ornamental swirl or curl. It often implies movement towards a goal or a physical winding shape.
